title: Croup and Whooping Cough
summary: Croup and whooping cough are respiratory illnesses common in children and infants. Croup is often caused by viral infections such as RSV or parainfluenza and is characterized by a barking cough.

# Healthline Parenthood: Parent-focused advice you can trust

**Description**: Welcome to Parenthood. Here's your expert-backed guide for your growing family. From fertility-testing, to pregnancy, to raising your baby. Don't worry, you've got this.


Bezzy communities provide meaningful connections with others living with chronic conditions. Join Bezzy on the web or mobile app.

* Inflammatory Bowel Disease

* COPD

* Migraine

* Multiple Sclerosis

* Psoriasis

Can't get enough? Connect with us for all things health.
